name: Aries: Origins
description:
Aries® is a fan made implementation of the board game Hive, a game remotely resembling chess.

The app features a stunning user interface and offers 3 beautiful themes for you to choose from.

By purchasing our app, you will gain access to the following services:

- Play against other players online via our server.
- Play against 4 levels of AI, ranging from easy to pro (winning against the pro AI is almost impossible).
- Play against another human offline.

No other in app purchases, ads, whatsoever.
